Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Veritas', 3: 'My duty is to purify the battlefield.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lotus', 3: 'The crimson lotus is in full bloom!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Just as the last Corrupted falls, you hear the unstable female electronic voice once more.'}
{2: '-AI-', 3: 'Area cleared. All enemies have been eliminated. Please proceed to the next area.'}
{3: 'Lotus and the other Construct frames remain silent. They have not been programmed to respond to combat-unrelated communication.'}
{2: '-AI-', 3: "Recommended Strategy: Current damage will not affect the team's combat performance. Please proceed to the next area."}
{2: 'Data might not suffer injuries, but I sure will.', 3: '34'}
{2: '-AI-', 3: 'You have currently suffered zero injuries, Commandant.'}
{2: '-AI-', 3: "Are not the best soldiers those who fully carry out the commandant's orders?"}
{2: "I don't want to use soldiers like pawns.", 3: '38'}
{2: '-AI-', 3: 'After a brief rest, please proceed to the next area.'}
